title: Exploring Key Factors for Improving Team Learning Outcomes

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in basic team projects and comprehension of mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Adult learners analyze team dynamics while performing math problem-solving simulations in VR environments. Provides personalized learning experiences in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) setting.

learning_goals: Explain the four core factors (transformational leadership, conflict types, cohesion, psychological safety) that influence team learning outcomes.
Apply a qualitative comparative analysis (QCA) process to interpret survey data.
Propose improvements for team learning environments based on VR simulation results.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
